thread.title: Really good hotel in Lower Manhattan
thread.title_full: Really good hotel in Lower Manhattan - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Pittsburgh_cyclist
title: Really good hotel in Lower Manhattan
text:
The hotel was s right next to the World Trade Centre and a short walk to several MTA stations, so it's s great location for exploring lower Manhattan. Standard rooms are small but well designed with adequate storage space and comfortable beds. They seem to specialise in corporate clients so there are great weekend deals.
There is a good gym, free coffee in the lounge and helpful staff at the front desk.
Location isn't quite as good as the Wall St branch, but overall I have no complaints.
